label: GeographicalPoint
comment: A point on the surface of the Earth (reference ISO 19136).

objectProperties.comment: The direct position list associated with this geographical line.
The geographical object characteristic associated with this geographical grid.
A logistics location associated with this specified circle.

referencedBy.comment: The geographical point which defines the centre of this specified circle.
The geographical point included in this geographical feature.
A geographical point member of this geographical multi-point feature.
